text: Mork and Mindy is an American television sitcom which ran from 1978 to 1982. It stars Robin Williams and Pam Dawber as the title characters. The series was made by Garry Marshall. Comedian Jonathan Winters has a recurring role in the series. Mork and Mindy is a spin-off from Marshall's other popular TV series, Happy Days. The plot of the series is that alien named Mork from a planet called Ork who travels to Earth and becomes friends with a woman named Mindy in Boulder, Colorado. == Other websites == * Category:1978 American television series debuts Category:1982 disestablishments in the United States Category:1982 television series endings Category:1970s American television series Category:1980s American television series Category:American science fiction television series Category:American sitcoms Category:Television series set in Colorado Category:Boulder, Colorado Category:Television spin-offs Category:1978 establishments in the United States Category:English-language television programs Category:ABC network series
title: Mork & Mindy
